translation.home-left-text: Do you have any ideas? Then I will be committed to creating it.
translation.about-left-text: Hi, I'm Leonardo — a big fan of chess and all things tech. My coding journey started when I decided to switch careers, realizing that web development was the perfect blend of creativity and logic for me. I dove into a bootcamp at Boolean, where I picked up the skills to build web applications from scratch. Now, I’m excited to find a place where I can keep learning, growing, and contributing as a developer.
translation.name: NAME
translation.omniloq-description: Encrypts every password, safely storing your accounts and logins. Create and save how many items as you wish. Set to be used from any device, desktop or mobile.
